He added: Don't get me wrong, he's still my boss, but he's sort of a Victorian father- you'd hate to let him down. On the occasion that happens I literally feel sick. the deal that sent veteran forward Kevin Willis to the Nuggets, Keon Clark quietly stole the show from two of the NBA's top scorers. "We're excited about( Keon Clark )," Toronto coach Lenny Wilkens said. We're trying to work in as quickly as we can, and show him something different every day, and he's just gobbling it up. He's excited about being here and I thought that was just an incredible job he did to step in for( Ricky Davis ). We went to him several times because we wanted him to know we had confidence in him. He did a great job. After helping Toronto eclipse a 20-point first-half deficit, Keon Clark watched helplessly as Allen Iverson fueled a 17-0 Philadelphia burst with 11 points, leaving the Raptors with an 89-78 deficit with 8:47 left in regulation.
